name: reIterate() - Alpha Mode
description:
The reIterate playable Alpha is here!

Enjoy 10 levels of pure platforming action, ranging from insultingly easy to hair-pullingly difficult. Then, when you've done that, enjoy Speedrun Mode to set a world record time! 

Marvel at the Story system that... exists, and at the Options menu that... works! 

Then come and yell all of your feedback in the LTGD Discord! 

In-game tutorials are pretty minimal  non-existent, so let me help you out:

DEFAULT CONTROLS

KEYBOARD (please don't use a keyboard, please use a controller)

  • Arrow keys - Menu/movement
  • Space - Jump/Confirm
  • Escape - Cancel
  • Backspace - Pause
  • G - Ghost Mode (when activated in the options menu)
  • [ ] (Square Bracket Keys) - Next/Prev Music Track

CONTROLLER (please don't use the analogue stick, please use the d-pad)

  • You'll figure it out
  • I promise, I'm not just being lazy
  • Seriously, you will
  • I believe in you
